title: PBE Downloading Extremely Slow?
body:
I've seen a couple of older posts about this same issue, but I felt as if starting a new discussion would be okay due to the fact that many new users were just accepted to PBE, and also because the client was just recently revamped for the new season.

With that being said, my client is downloading painfully slow. I'm stuck at around 350kbps and my down-speed is around 180MBps (campus ethernet op).

Is anybody else experiencing the same thing? If so, do you have any potential fixes?

Thanks!

replies.body: Most players are experiencing those slow download speeds from the looks of it. It's due to the heavy traffic of so many people trying to download the PBE client all at the same time which is slowing everyone down.

> [{quoted}](name=Mr BalIoon Hands,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ikHBl9VV,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-10-16T23:47:01.330+0000)

As I posted this and restarted the download for the 4th time, my speed finally reflects my actual down speed. If you're experiencing the same issue, try deleting the PBE and reinstalling. If possible, install to an SSD!

I'm downloading at 468kb/s the game atm. It says 297 min. Going from hard drive to SSD changed nothing, is your servers speed capped on the PBE ?

EDIT: I'm at 488kb/s, that's an improvement. My guess is that URF is out on pbe for a few days now, and since you guys are starving us with this game mode everyone just swapped to the pbe.
Having the same issue today. Was downloading with 1.4 MB/s yesterday but today with 280 kb/s
